item.title: Project 1: NLP web app development and deployment using FastAPI and Heroku
item.description: • Designed the process behind developing and deploying a ML NLP model using sentiments from user reviews. • Implemented a NLP model web app using python and FastAPI, which can analyze sentiments using texts as user input. • Deployed the model in GitHub using Heroku. • Trained a NLP model using python and pickle and develop a ML platform using FastAPI. • The model can predict user sentiments using reviews or texts as input.

item.title: Project 2: Stress Classification using 2D ECG Images and Computer Vision
item.description: Design of converting 1D ECG data to 2D ECG images using python and OpenCV • Utilized Python and Open CV to convert 1D ECG signals to 2D images and saved the data in Google Drive using the os package. • Innovated the first ever stress image dataset, capable of predicting stress using images. • Performed better than 1D data, predicted stress with 95.25% accuracy. • Image detection has made it possible to detect credit card fraud, faces and diseases using near perfect accuracy and at a rapid pace.

item.title: Devlopment of state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms using autoencoder and transfer learning techniques
item.description: Design and model architecture of a novel 1D VGG16 transfer learning algorithm • Developed SOTA machine learning algorithm using python. • Develop a novel SOTA CNN algorithm using transfer learning and autoencoder techniques. Predicted stress with 99.61%. • Developed a novel 1D VGG16 algorithm for the very first time, using transfer learning and autoencoder techniques. Predicted stress with 99.72%. • Overfitting and time complexity is an on-going and recurrent problem associated with classification of 1D data using deep learning, which was mitigated with transfer learning and autoencoder techniques.

item.title: Research publications in top tier journals like IEEE EMBC and Frontiers in Digital Health
item.description: • Published 2 research papers in top tier Journals (IEEE EMBC and Frontiers in Digital Health). • Collaborated with leading industries like Intel and Shaftesbury inc, in order to analyze and develop insights about the aptitude of their products for machine learning applications and mitigating stress. • Collaborated with Shaftesbury inc, in order to understand the impact of their novel VR video game (which was simulated using unity 3D) for mitigating stress.

item.title: Novel DT from scratch using python and object-oriented programming and developed four vidoe game web apps using Javascript, html and css
item.description: Utilized Javascript, html and css to develop a blackjack video game app • Developed a novel and more effective DT cart model from scratch using a novel gini index. • The algorithm was developed using python and object-oriented programming. • Unlike other DT algorithm, the gini index ranks the decisions and organizes them accordingly, rather than using majority voting, resulting in a lower time complexity and more efficiency.

item.title: Autoencoder to reduce data complexity, redundancy and noise. A Semi-Supervised method to predict credit card fraud with SOTA
item.description: • Data Imbalance is a significant problem which is often overlooked, leading to biased data, and overfitting. • Utilized python to develop a novel autoencoder algorithm capable of significantly reducing data complexity, noise and redundancy. • Utilized semi-supervised learning to predict credit card fraud with SOTA using a proposed neural network. • Significantly reduced the amount of data imbalance and intertwined data using an unsupervised autoencoder. Significantly reduced the amount of interwined data using an autoencoder algorithm Github Repository: https://github.
